Project description

Scanpy – Single-Cell Analysis in Python

Scanpy is a scalable toolkit for analyzing single-cell gene expression databuilt jointly with anndata. It includespreprocessing, visualization, clustering, trajectory inference and differentialexpression testing. The Python-based implementation efficiently deals withdatasets of more than one million cells.

Discuss usage on the scverse Discourse. Read the documentation.If you'd like to contribute by opening an issue or creating a pull request, please take a look at our contributing guide.If Scanpy is useful for your research, consider citing Genome Biology (2018).
